markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Shoony Militia Member](/Monsters.aspx?ID=522)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

If shoonies had their way, war would cease to exist altogether, but they know this isn’t likely. Shoonies’ relative wealth of resources and their frailty compared to other humanoids make them a common target of violence and subjugation. Because of this, basic combat training is typically mandatory for all shoony village members. Few individuals pursue lifelong careers in service to their settlement’s militia, however. The passing down of a sword from one shoony soldier to another is a time-honored tradition, owing to the rarity of weapons in shoony society.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 21

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Shoony Militia Member](/Monsters.aspx?ID=522)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +8; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Shoony](/Languages.aspx?ID=56)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +4, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [Javelin](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (2)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +8 

A shoony's small, blunt snout and labyrinthine sinus system make them resistant to phenomena that assail the nose. When they rolls a saving throw against [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) threats (such as inhaled poisons) and [olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246) effects (such as [xulgath stench](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=102)), they get the outcome one degree of success better than the result of their roll.
</row>

**HP** 40

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
longsword +10 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
javelin +10 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-121" />
name: Shoony Militia Member
